        public Player(java.lang.String name)

        public void setCards(int index,
                     Card card)
        Method to update the cards a player has in their hand.
        Parameters:
        index - index in player card array to place the card.
        card - the card to place into the players hand.

      • setHand

        public void setHand(Hand hand)
        Method to update the hand a player currently has (cards on table + cards in hand).
        Parameters:
        hand - the hand to give the player.

        Method to update the amount of chips a player has.
        Parameters:

        Returns the current hand of the player.
        Returns:
        The current hand of the player.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the player
        Returns:

      • getCards

        public Card[] getCards()
        Method to view the cards a player was dealt.
        Returns:
        Two element card array representing initial cards a player was dealt.

      • getChips

        public int getChips()
        Method to view current amount of chips a player has
        Returns:
        chips as an integer value.

      • fold

        public void fold()
        Method to cause a player to fold. Sets boolean isFolded to true.

      • unFold

        public void unFold()
        Method to 'unfold' a player before the next hand begins. Sets boolean isFolded to false.

      • checkFold

        public boolean checkFold()
        Determines whether or not a player has chosen to fold.
        Returns:
        true if player is folded and false otherwise.
